channel.title: I need emote help,

item.title: I need emote help,
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

i have the command,

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7640) {
startAnimation(1500);
stillgfx(246, absY, absX);
startAnimation(1501);
stillgfx(465, absY, absX);
pEmote = 1501;
pWalk = 3129;
}

all i want it to do is set walk emote to the fly thing and when ur standing till to the pEmote
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 06:36:26 PM[/size][hr]cant some 1 help me?

Read full topic
